description: This Java class 'InMemoryNoteRepository' implements a simple in-memory repository for 'Note' objects, providing basic create, update, find, and delete operations. It's designed for lightweight or fallback use when no database is configured.

classes.name: InMemoryNoteRepository
classes.description: A repository class managing Note objects in memory using a thread-safe ConcurrentHashMap. Provides CRUD operations for notes.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note with a unique id, current timestamp, and provided title and content.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by id, changing its title, content, and update timestamp.

methods.name: findAll
methods.description: Retrieves all stored notes sorted by their id in ascending order.

methods.name: findById
methods.description: Finds a note by its id, returning an Optional.

methods.name: deleteById
methods.description: Deletes a note by its id, returning whether the deletion was successful.
